text: Felipe Benito Tromp (15 October 1917 â€“ 12 August 1995) was the first governor of Aruba after Aruba. He took office as governor on 1 January 1986 and left office on 12 March 1992. He was succeeded by Olindo Koolman. Tromp died on 12 August 1995, at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Governors of Aruba
title: Felipe Tromp
